text: Jouy-en-Josas is a city in the Yvelines department in the ÃŽle-de-France region of France. The inhabitants are called "Jovaciens" and "Jovaciennes". The city is world-renowned for hosting the main campus of HEC Paris since 1964.Il y a 50 ans, HEC quittait Paris pour Jouy-en-Josas ==References== Category:Communes in Yvelines
title: Jouy-en-Josas
